attributes.action: give the people of britain a refurendum on weather we want to stay in the eec or get completly out of europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it's about time the government gave us the choice weather we want to stay in the eec or withdraw from it. the way to do this would be by refferendum with this question - do you want to withdraw from the eec completly? 
     YES   OR   NO

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
